comment.author: 51035786400@N01
comment._content: It just looks like he is swimming in his clothes. The pictures of him always seem so unreal to me. To me he looks as if he would much rather be some place else and is being as patient as possible. The look on his face (to me) reminds me of "this is the last one right" faces my kids give me.

comment.author: 35773439@N05
comment._content: I got news for all you gossips...Lincoln wasn't gay.  I've got 35 books on the man and he was not.  The people who believe that are the people who their news from the National Enquirer.  He had a wife and 4 children.  The rumor started because he shared a bed with a man when he was in his 20s.  There were also other men living in that same house who shared beds.  It wasn't scandalous back then.  The guy he shared a bed with told him where he could find a prostitute.  His law partner for 17 yrs said that Lincoln feared he caught syphillis from a woman.
